about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a Highly Focused Frontend Specialist driven by precision and effective problem-solving. My expertise is centered on TypeScript, React, and Next.js, technologies I use to build highly responsive, accessible, and scalable user interfaces.
about.paragraph2: For 3 years, I served as a Computer Network Technician in the Brazilian Navy, an experience that provided me with a disciplined and systematic approach to solving complex problems. This background complements my passion for turning challenging requirements into clean, production-ready code. My experience spans the full development cycle of modern Front-end architectureâ€”from visual implementation to RESTful API integrationâ€”ensuring reliability, performance, and measurable value delivery in global projects.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support
technicalSupport.description: I offer complete technical support for the implementation, optimization and maintenance of your website. I monitor performance, correct faults, make updates and adjustments according to your needs, ensuring that the site works efficiently, securely and in line with your business objectives.

websiteCreation.title: Website Creation
websiteCreation.description: I develop customized websites from scratch, with an attractive design in line with your visual identity. I use modern frameworks such as ReactJS and NextJS, as well as creating websites using WordPress with Elementor. I also offer ongoing maintenance, ensuring that the site is always up-to-date and working optimally.

exclusiveCustomizations.title: Exclusive customizations
exclusiveCustomizations.description: If your current website doesn't reflect what you need, I offer exclusive customizations to adapt the design and functionalities, aligning it exactly with the image you want to convey to your customers.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Contact me via the links below
contacts.formDescription: We usually respond in a few hours.
